text: Margaret Helena Roney was a sailor from Great Britain, who represented her country at the 1928 Summer Olympics in Amsterdam, Netherlands. She was the sister of Esmond Roney and Ernest Roney. ==Sources== * Category:Sailors at the 1928 Summer Olympics – 8 Metre Category:British female sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Great Britain Category:1899 births Category:1983 deaths
title: Margaret Roney
